message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.GT, cs.MM, cs.RO 

This paper deals with the problem of reproducing the world lighting from a single image of an object covered with random specular microfacets on the surface. This involves designing a special imaging system and developing algorithms for calibration and inference. Therefore, the most likely category is computer vision (cs.CV), followed by computer graphics (cs.GR) and geometry (cs.GT). The paper also involves some aspects of multimedia (cs.MM) and robotics (cs.RO) as it deals with imaging systems and inference algorithms.
